tool_description: Distance API: Your solution for straightforward distance calculations. Perfect for determining direct distances between two points. Easy integration for your application's needs.
name: Distance API
title: Distance API

api_list.name: Distance
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the geographical distance between two locations specified as parameters in the request

required_parameters.name: location2
required_parameters.description: Any location that can be found on OSM; region, city, town street, address etc

required_parameters.name: location1
required_parameters.description: Any location that can be found on OSM; region, city, town street, address etc

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: kilometers or miles. defaults to kilometers

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Any language code. ie \\\\\\\"fr\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"en\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"de\\\\\\\"... Defaults to \\\\\\\"en\\\\\\\".
You can use \\\\\\\"None\\\\\\\" if you need places in their respective language. Example
Bangkok > กรุงเทพฯ
